name: gobciti
description: Gobciti is an investment platform designed for fractional and non-fractional property sales, running within the Binance Smart Chain network.GOBS is the platform's native utility token used to:*Buy the fractions of each property, which are sold on our platform and future real estate investment project, in the planning period to build the property.*Used for reward on our decentralized exchange (DEX) running within the Binance Smart Chain network.*The GOBS token will allow access to special functions and use cases, not accessible by users without the token*Used for governance votes to determine how resources are allocated for new projects. * Over time, more utility for the token will also be added.*Gobciti officially launches the GOBS token.* Maximum created supply of GOBS coins 300,000,000
